meanings.definition: A place or hospital department where outpatients are given medical treatment or advice.
meanings.sent1: The clinics in our town are always busy with patients seeking medical help.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment at the clinics tomorrow for a check-up.
meanings.sent3: The clinics were so full that the waiting room felt like a crowded bus.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a clinic for the soul, healing all who came to her.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sign of the clinics stood out, beckoning those in need of care.

meanings.definition: A group of medical, paramedical, or dental personnel organized to provide medical care to a specific group.
meanings.sent1: The clinics of volunteers worked tirelessly to help the community.
meanings.sent2: Our school has a health clinic where nurses and doctors provide care.
meanings.sent3: The clinics of clowns brought laughter and joy to the children's ward.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was a clinic in efficiency, setting a high standard for others.
meanings.sent5: The mobile clinics traveled to remote areas, bringing healthcare to those in need.
